title: Reference manual data upload
fileUploadText: Manually upload a csv file (saved as Comma-separated Values .csv), max size 2MB
warningText: Prior to upload you must ensure the file is suitable for location data upload e.g. file should be in correct formats.

fileUploadErrors.typeError: Please upload a valid file format
fileUploadErrors.sizeError: File too large, please upload file smaller than 2MB
